message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $180 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer.  I could come down to $160, but I can't go any lower than that.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $160 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $140.  If that's not acceptable, I'll have to go with John's offer.
